descriptions:
Introducing the oannao Silicone Cooking Utensils Kitchen Set - a must-have collection of essential kitchen tools designed to make your culinary experience more enjoyable and hassle-free. This set includes 14 versatile pieces, each crafted with premium food grade silicone and sturdy wooden handles, ensuring a perfect blend of style, durability, and functionality.

Experience the freedom of cooking at higher temperatures without worrying about your utensils. With a remarkable heat resistance of up to 446¬∞F, our set is ideal for all your nonstick cookware needs. Each piece boasts a one-piece design with no gaps, making food release effortless and preventing any unwanted residue from sticking.

Savor the taste of your dishes as our BPA-free, non-reactive, and odorless silicone utensils are safe for you and your family. The comfortable wooden handles provide a secure and heat insulated grip, preventing any discomfort while preparing delicious meals.

Our extensive set includes: Deep Soup Ladle, Solid Serving Spoon, Slotted Spoon, Slotted Turner, Turner, Food Tongs, Pasta Server, Flexible Spatula, Basting Brush, Whisk, Round Spatula Turner, Large Skimmer Spoon, Small Silicone Spatula, and a convenient Utensil Holder.

Get ready to cook with confidence as our initial use instructions ensure a delightful first experience ‚Äì simply soak each piece for half an hour, followed by a three-hour airing time to remove the original silica gel smell. Rest assured, we offer a prompt after-sales response within 12 hours for any inquiries or concerns you may have.

Upgrade your kitchen tools today and elevate your cooking game with the oannao Silicone Cooking Utensils Kitchen Set!

Discover the oannao Silicone Cooking Utensils Kitchen Set, a must-have addition to your culinary arsenal! This set, featuring 14 essential pieces, is crafted with high-quality food grade silicone and stainless steel core for superior durability and heat resistance up to 446 degrees Fahrenheit.

Say goodbye to plastic or metal utensils that damage nonstick cookware, as our set is specifically designed for it. Each piece boasts a one-piece design, no gaps molding, ensuring no food gets trapped. The set includes a Deep Soup Ladle, Solid Serving Spoon, Slotted Spoon, Slotted Turner, Turner, Food Tongs, Pasta Server, Flexible Spatula, Basting Brush, Whisk, Round Spatula Turner, Large Skimmer Spoon, and Small Silicone Spatula. Plus, an Utensil Holder is included to keep your kitchen organized!

Our set's wooden handles not only provide a comfortable grip but also prevent heat transfer for your safety. They're BPA-free and food-grade, ensuring your meals remain free from harmful chemicals. The initial use instructions include soaking the utensils for half an hour and airing them for about 3 hours to remove any original silica gel smell.

Experience ease in meal preparation with our set - all pieces are easy to clean, though not dishwasher safe. Plus, we guarantee a quick response time of within 12 hours for any after-sales inquiries or concerns!
